briefTitle: Safety and Effectiveness of Wavefront-Guided LASIK Corrections of Myopic Refractive Errors
officialTitle: A Prospective Study to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of Wavefront-Guided LASIK Correction of Myopic Refractive Errors With the iDesign Advanced Wavescan Studio™ System and Star S4IR™ Excimer Laser

interventions.name: LASIK correction of myopic refractive errors

summary: The purpose of this clinical trial is to demonstrate that wavefront-guided LASIK is safe and effective for the correction of myopic refractive errors.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Eyes With Loss of More Than 2 Lines Best Spectacle Corrected Visual Acuity (BSCVA)
